attributes.action: Withold MPs salaries until the house agrees a way out of the Brexit impasse.
attributes.additional_details: MPs are playing games,and politics has superseded the national interest.
attributes.background: The opportunity cost of Parliament playing politics with Brexit is great. This country needs a functioning parliament to work on the day to day running of the country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: 

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
